text: Hagi Israeli vahe'mo'za ana zamavu zamavara hu'za neazageno, Ra Anumzamo'ma eri'za vahe'a kasnampa vahe zamagipi huvazino koro kema huzamante'nea nanekemo'a nena raga'a efore hu'ne. Ana hutege'za Asiria vahe'mo'za Israeli vahera eme ha'huzamante'za zamavare'za Asiria moparega kina ome huzmantazage'za anantega umani'ne'za meni'nena 17:23 Meninema hu'neana ama knareku osu'neanki avontafe'ma kre'naza knagu hu'ne. mani'naze.
